data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel - Zeram Capsule Pack
data.detailed_description:
At Thors Military Academy, Erebonia’s best learn everything from the art of war to liberal arts. First year Rean Schwarzer learns he’s been selected to join the controversial Class VII, and they’ll need to deal with more than just class warfare--they’ll need to safeguard their country from chaos.

DLC:
Zeram Capsule Pack

Students of Thors Military Academy know that they can't afford to spend battles K.O.ed on the floor. That's why they carry Zeram Capsules: a powerful pill even more potent than Zeram Powder that can instantly get a friend back in the fight, restoring all HP and 200 CP. This pack contains 10 Zeram Capsules.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Atom x7-Z8700 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 5 (GeForce 400 / Radeon HD 5000 / Intel post-2012 series)

  • Storage: 15 GB available space
